summary: This module provides a suite of context‑processor callables that accept a request object and return dictionaries containing common values—CSRF token, debug flag, i18n configuration, media and static URLs, the request itself, and timezone information—so they can be automatically merged into Django template contexts.
business_intent: Enable Django templates to have ready access to frequently needed request‑related data (security tokens, configuration flags, resource URLs, localization and timezone settings) without manual injection, streamlining template rendering and improving consistency across the web application.
